scripts.sendToLambda: npm run zip && aws s3 cp function.zip s3://chrome-aws-lambda-jacob --profile user1 && rm function.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name audible-libraries-backend --s3-bucket chrome-aws-lambda-jacob --s3-key function.zip --profile user1 && aws s3 rm s3://chrome-aws-lambda-jacob/function.zip --profile user1
